      • MongoDbQueryDefinition

        public MongoDbQueryDefinition(boolean compositeItems,
                      Class<?> mongoClass,
                      int batchSize,
                      Object idPropertyId)
        Constructor for configuring query definition.
        Parameters:
        compositeItems - True if items are wrapped to CompositeItems.
        mongoClass - The mongodb class.
        batchSize - The batch size.
        idPropertyId - The ID of the ID property or null if item index is used as ID.
